author: civanch
body: Added additional step limiter which may be activated for electrons and positrons. Added Russian roulette for gamma to Stacking action (the same place as for neutrons). Clean-up Geant4 Stacking, Tracking, Stepping actions. Russian roulette is enabled by default RR parameters: for neutron 0.1, fo rgamma HCAL and iron 0.3, for gamma ECAL and pre-shower 0.5.
title: added step limiter for e+e-
